Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: Base KM COMPONENT VERSION: 1 AUTHOR: Oracle COMPATIBILITY: ODI 12.2.1.4.0 or above
DESCRIPTION This KM provides some common options and methods used by the other Oracle ERP Cloud Extract KMs.
Delete temporary objects at end of mapping
Set this option to NO, if you wish to retain temporary objects (tables, files and scripts) after integration. Useful for debugging. Default: true

<$ import oracle.odi.core.OdiInstance; import oracle.odi.core.security.cryptography.IOdiCipher; import oracle.odi.core.security.cryptography.CipherFactory; import oracle.odi.domain.model.OdiDataStore; import oracle.odi.domain.mapping.physical.MapPhysicalNode; import java.util.Base64; import java.util.List;
String request = "<request>
" + " <report>
" + " <id>" + "$[BIPReportLocation]" + "</id>
" + " <report_params>
" + "$[BIPReportParameters]" + " <fusionapps_request_id>16760</fusionapps_request_id>
" + " </report_params>
" + " </report>
" + " <delivery>
" + " <ROWSET>
" + " <ROW>
" + " <KEY/>
" + " <OUTPUT_NAME>Data Document</OUTPUT_NAME>
" + " </ROW>
" + " <ROW>
" + " <KEY/>
" + " <TEMPLATE></TEMPLATE>
" + " <OUTPUT_FORMAT>csv</OUTPUT_FORMAT>
" + " <OUTPUT_NAME></OUTPUT_NAME>
" + " <DEL_CHANNEL></DEL_CHANNEL>
" + " <PARAMETER4>SUBJECT: BIP Web Service Test</PARAMETER4>
" + " <PARAMETER5>BODY: Test Report Body</PARAMETER5>
" + " <PARAMETER6>false</PARAMETER6>
" + " <PARAMETER7></PARAMETER7>
" + " </ROW>
" + " </ROWSET>
" + " </delivery>
" + "</request>"; byte[] encryptedRequestInBytes = Base64.getEncoder().encode(request.getBytes("UTF-8")); String encryptedRequest = new String(encryptedRequestInBytes); $> OdiInvokeWebService "-URL=$[reportRequestWsdl]" "-PORT_TYPE=PublicReportWSSService" "-OPERATION=submitReport" "-RESPONSE_MODE=NEW_FILE" "-RESPONSE_FILE=$[submitReportResponseFile]" "-RESPONSE_FILE_FORMAT=XML" "-HTTP_USER=$[httpUser]" "-HTTP_PASS=$[httpPassword]"
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:pub="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/service/PublicReportService"> <soap:Header/> <soap:Body> <pub:submitReport> <pub:submitReportData><$=encryptedRequest$></pub:submitReportData> <pub:appParams></pub:appParams> </pub:submitReport> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

<@
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.BufferedInputStream;
import java.io.BufferedOutputStream;
import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.io.IOException;

File inFile = new File("$[getScheduledReportOutputInfoResponseFile]");
reader = new BufferedReader( new InputStreamReader( new FileInputStream(inFile), "UTF8"));
xmlContentBuf = new StringBuffer();
while ((str = reader.readLine()) != null) {
  xmlContentBuf.append(str);
}
reader.close();

xmlContent = xmlContentBuf.toString();
first = xmlContent.indexOf("outputId");
leftXmlContent = xmlContent.substring(first+9);
last = leftXmlContent.indexOf("outputId");
outputid = leftXmlContent.substring(0, last-2);

first2 = leftXmlContent.indexOf("status");
status = leftXmlContent.substring(first2+7, first2+14);
if (!status.equalsIgnoreCase("SUCCESS")) {
  first3 = leftXmlContent.indexOf("statusDetail");
  leftXmlContent2 = leftXmlContent.substring(first3+13);
  last3 = leftXmlContent2.indexOf("statusDetail");
  errorMsg = leftXmlContent2.substring(0, last3-2);
  throw new RuntimeException("BIP job ran with following error: " + errorMsg);
}
@>
OdiInvokeWebService "-URL=$[scheduleRequestWsdl]" "-PORT_TYPE=ScheduleReportWSSService" "-OPERATION=getDocumentData" "-RESPONSE_MODE=NEW_FILE" "-RESPONSE_FILE=$[getDocumentDataResponseFile]" "-RESPONSE_FILE_FORMAT=XML" "-HTTP_USER=$[httpUser]" "-HTTP_PASS=$[httpPassword]"

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:sch="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/service/ScheduleReportService">
   <soap:Header/>
   <soap:Body>
      <sch:getDocumentData>
         <jobOutputID><@=outputid@></jobOutputID>
      </sch:getDocumentData>
   </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

<@
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.BufferedInputStream;
import java.io.BufferedOutputStream;
import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.io.IOException;

File inFile = new File("$[submitReportResponseFile]");
reader = new BufferedReader( new InputStreamReader( new FileInputStream(inFile), "UTF8"));
xmlContentBuf = new StringBuffer();
while ((str = reader.readLine()) != null) {
  xmlContentBuf.append(str);
}
reader.close();

xmlContent = xmlContentBuf.toString();
first = xmlContent.indexOf("submitReportReturn");
last = xmlContent.lastIndexOf("submitReportReturn");
jobid = xmlContent.substring(first+19, last-6);
@>
OdiInvokeWebService "-URL=$[scheduleRequestWsdl]" "-PORT_TYPE=ScheduleReportWSSService" "-OPERATION=getReportHistoryInfo" "-RESPONSE_MODE=NEW_FILE" "-RESPONSE_FILE=$[getReportHistoryInfoResponseFile]" "-RESPONSE_FILE_FORMAT=XML" "-HTTP_USER=$[httpUser]" "-HTTP_PASS=$[httpPassword]" "-RETRY_ON_ERROR=0" "-RETRY_INTERVAL_SECONDS=10"

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:sch="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/service/ScheduleReportService">
   <soap:Header/>
   <soap:Body>
      <sch:getReportHistoryInfo>
         <jobInstanceID><@=jobid@></jobInstanceID>
      </sch:getReportHistoryInfo>
   </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

<@
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.BufferedInputStream;
import java.io.BufferedOutputStream;
import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.io.IOException;

File inFile = new File("$[submitReportResponseFile]");
reader = new BufferedReader( new InputStreamReader( new FileInputStream(inFile), "UTF8"));
xmlContentBuf = new StringBuffer();
while ((str = reader.readLine()) != null) {
  xmlContentBuf.append(str);
}
reader.close();

xmlContent = xmlContentBuf.toString();
first = xmlContent.indexOf("submitReportReturn");
last = xmlContent.lastIndexOf("submitReportReturn");
jobid = xmlContent.substring(first+19, last-6);
@>
OdiInvokeWebService "-URL=$[scheduleRequestWsdl]" "-PORT_TYPE=ScheduleReportWSSService" "-OPERATION=getScheduledReportOutputInfo" "-RESPONSE_MODE=NEW_FILE" "-RESPONSE_FILE=$[getScheduledReportOutputInfoResponseFile]" "-RESPONSE_FILE_FORMAT=XML" "-HTTP_USER=$[httpUser]" "-HTTP_PASS=$[httpPassword]"

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:sch="http://xmlns.oracle.com/oxp/service/ScheduleReportService">
   <soap:Header/>
   <soap:Body>
      <sch:getScheduledReportOutputInfo>
         <jobInstanceID><@=jobid@></jobInstanceID>
      </sch:getScheduledReportOutputInfo>
   </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>
